text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga lacustris is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is endemic to Veracruz state, in eastern Mexico.
It is an Endangered species, threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga lacustris". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38263A10104105. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38263A10104105.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
